testcase.classname: F01_Register | guest users could create new accounts
testcase.name: user could create new account with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to register page............................................passed When user selects gender type...............................................passed And user enters "automation" and "tester"...................................passed And user selects date of birth..............................................passed And user enters email"test@example.com".....................................passed And user enters "P@ssw0rd" and confirm it...................................passed And user click register button..............................................passed Then account is created successfully........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Currencies | users could change currency to (€)
testcase.name: user could change currency from homepage to (€)
testcase.system-out: When user Selects Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then Euro Symbol (€) is shown on the four products displayed in Home page...passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users could search for a product by name or serial number (sku)
testcase.name: user could search for a product by it's name - Example #1.1

failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [true] but found [false], expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: expected [true] but found [false], expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefs.D04_Search.listOfRelevantProductsContainsShouldAppearInTheSearchResultList(D04_Search.java:57) at ✽.list of relevant products contains "book" should appear in the search result list(file:///C:/Users/live01/IdeaProjects/java1/demonopcommerce/src/main/resources/Features/F04_Search.feature:7)
testcase.system-out: When user clicks search box.................................................passed And user enters product name as "book"......................................passed And clicks on search button.................................................passed Then list of relevant products contains "book" should appear in the search result list.failed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | users could hover on one of the three main categories and select random subcategory
testcase.name: users could hover on one of the three main categories and select random subcategory
testcase.system-out: When user selects and hovers on one of the three main categories............passed And user selects random one of the sub categories...........................passed Then the sub-category title is (equal or contains) the one you get it while selecting random sub-category.passed

testcase.classname: F08_Wishlist | users could add products to Wishlist
testcase.name: user could add product of the four products shown on the Homepage to Wishlist ( HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop )
testcase.system-out: When you click on wishlist button ❤️ on this product "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop".passed Then you will see success message "The product has been added to your wishlist" with green background color.passed

testcase.classname: F08_Wishlist | users could add products to Wishlist
testcase.name: user opens Wishlist and checks if product added correctly ( HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop )
testcase.system-out: When you click on wishlist button ❤️ on this product "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop".passed And wait until success message is disappeared...............................passed And click on Wishlist tab...................................................passed Then you should see your product is added correctly.........................passed
